frame.name: Government_institution
frame.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Institution</fen> is an organization which is part of a government, the <fen>Purpose</fen> of which is to provide a service or fulfill a role designated by the government. The <fen>Purpose</fen> may, but need not, entail direct interaction of the citizenry.</def-root>

FE.name: Institution
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Institution</fen> forms a part of a governmental body. It consists of individual <fen>Members</fen> and is dedicated to a <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The reason for which an <fen>Organization</fen> is formed or the purpose to which it is dedicated.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>A name given to the <fen>Organization</fen> for identification.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the general location where the <fen>Organization</fen> operates, but does not indicate the possessor of the <fen>Organization</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the <fen>Organization</fen> not covered by a more specific frame element.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The concern of the <fen>Institution</fen> -- broadly speaking, the aspect of society that they affect.</def-root>
